title: Woman hit by car after running across street 5 hours ago
content: SAN ANTONIO - A woman ran across the street late Friday night and was struck by an oncoming vehicle.    Authorities were called to the 6400 block of Wuzbach at about 9 p.m. for reports of an accident involving a pedestrian. Police said a driver traveling northbound on Wurzbach didn't see her. The pedestrian is in stable condition at the hospital with face and body injuries.    There will be no charges for the driver.
